story: Mohamed Alaa El Din shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Firefox 5 bugs – is this a joke?
caption: egypt-webdesign.com
description: Firefox 5 bugs – is this a joke? Today Mozilla released the latest Firefox browser version 5. After installing it on my PC (Windows 7 Ultimate 64 bit) I wanted to take a tour on the new featured such as: Application Tabs Tabs Panorama BUT I discover 2 big jokes in the latest Firefox release: [...]

data.message: Not sure about the Arabic bug coz it's working just fine here (I'm using the exact environment as you) but the 2nd one is not even a bug.. right click any tool bar, click customize and drag the "tab group" icon to any tool bar you prefer :)
